name: Ultimate Panic Flight
description: Ultimate Panic Flight is an endless flying game with extreme action. Flying further, avoiding obstacles and beat other players' score are the challenges proposed by this fun and addictive arcade game of great cartoon design. So no more running, it's time to fly!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz 32/64 bits Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL support 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 160 MB available space
